title: Hexed
description: The rules that once bound magic no longer apply. The balance between death and life has tipped, and Gwen Sparks can’t remember a thing. Left at the mercy of those claiming to be her friends, Gwen must piece together her life through flashes of random memories and vivid dreams, featuring two very alluring men. One thing is for sure, if they don’t fix the problem soon, the fate of the supernatural world is doomed.With the help of the last four remaining spirit walkers, Dorian Hade will fight like hell to fix what’s been broken and save the woman he has fallen for. But he’ll find out that some problems aren’t that easy to fix, and the only solution to this one is death.Gwen will sacrifice everything to save the ones she loves and right the world.Dorian will do everything to stop her. To save the woman he loves.
author: Stephanie  Nelson
